docs.text: Mapping documentation For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. From mapping to database Step 1 : Get correspond product need updating from database by shopee product id Step 2 : Update according to 4 cases Case 1 : Crawl product not in cms ==> Insert new product to database Case 2 : Number of rows in crawl = number of rows on cms ==> Update respectively from crawl to the database Case 3 : Number of rows in crawl < number of rows on cms ==> Update from oldest row to latest in database Use row with id 1554, 1555, 1556 in crawl to update row with id 4, 5, 6 in database Case 4 : Number of rows in crawl > number of rows on cms ==> Update respectively from crawl to the database and insert new product
docs.title: Home
